subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)

College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky survived on Brandon Knight’s layup with 2 seconds remaining to edge Princeton, 59-57, in its opening game of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
